burlap.behavior.singleagent.learning

Interface LearningAgent

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActorCritic, ApproximateQLearning, ARTDP, GradientDescentQLearning, GradientDescentSarsaLam, LSPI, PotentialShapedRMax, QLearning, SarsaLam

    public interface LearningAgent
    This is the standard interface for defining an agent that learns how to behave in the world through experience. There are two methods that need to be implemented. runLearningEpisode(burlap.mdp.singleagent.environment.Environment) and runLearningEpisode(burlap.mdp.singleagent.environment.Environment, int). Implementing the former method should have the agent interact with the provided Environment until the Environment transitions to a terminal state. The runLearningEpisode(burlap.mdp.singleagent.environment.Environment, int) should have the agent interact with the Environment until either a terminal state is reached or the agent has taken maxSteps in the environment. Both methods should return an Episode object that records the interactions.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan

      Episode runLearningEpisode(Environment env, int maxSteps)
